cab.content: OPERATIONS.From General Barter, Russia. 4/10/17.To :- C.I.G.S., War Office, (time of despatch not stated)1289 ,The weather in the Baltic being favourable, the General Staff expect early combined attack on Ezel island. Lately the Germans have unsuccessfully endeavoured to silenae 12 inch gun at southern extremity of the island whioh commands southernchannel to Gulf of Riga, It is now expeoted that Germans will attempt landing on west coast of the island and attack batteries from land side. After securing possession of islands. Germans-will attack Pernau from Riga by land assisted by strong German fleet with transports at present waiting at Libau.The Germans, if they capture Pernau will then attack Petrograd with Zeppelins. German attack also expected at any time immediately south of Chernowits, as well as an advance on Dvinsk.However, Germans recent inaction is attributed by some sound authorities to conviction of Germans that Russian Army will dissolve of itself at beginning of winter.
